alias.send: if (jfwobject and nvda.jaws_running()) then jfwobject:SayString("%1", 1) else stop() say("%1") end

muclient.script:
tts_enabled = true etts = true
if (GetVariable("ftts") == nil) then SetVariable("ftts",0) focusnote = true end
Accelerator("Ctrl+Shift+F12", "tts")
function OnPluginLoseFocus() if (etts == false) then return end if (GetVariable("ftts") == "0") then return end tts_enabled = false end
function OnPluginGetFocus() if focusnote then DoAfterSpecial(5, 'Execute("tts_interrupt You can type FTTS to control the speech should be silent when switching windows.")', 12) focusnote = false end if (etts == false) then return end if (GetVariable("ftts") == "0") then return end tts_enabled = true end
function tnote(what) Execute("tts_note "..what) end
function split(str, pat) local t = {} local fpat = "(.-)" .. pat local last_end = 1 local s, e, cap = str:find(fpat, 1) while s do if s ~= 1 or cap ~= "" then table.insert(t,cap) end last_end = e + 1 s, e, cap = str:find(fpat, last_end) end if last_end <= #str then cap = str:sub(last_end) table.insert(t, cap) end return t end
function OnPluginInstall () assert(package.loadlib("MushReader.dll", "luaopen_audio"))() stop() say("MushReader initialized") end
function say(str) nvda.say(str) end
function stop() nvda.stop() end
function OnPluginScreendraw(t, log, line) if (tts_enabled == false) then return end if (((t == 0) or (t == 1)) and not line:find("^%s*$")) then say(line) end end
function TTSFocusToggle() if (GetVariable("ftts") == "0") then Note("Speech will now be disabled when switching windows.") SetVariable("ftts", 1) elseif GetVariable("ftts")=="1" then Note("Speech will no longer be disabled when switching windows.") SetVariable("ftts",0) end end
function TTSToggle (name, line, wc) if (tts_enabled == true) then tts_enabled = false etts = false stop() say("Speech off.") elseif (tts_enabled == false) then tts_enabled = true etts = true stop() say("Speech on.") end end
function OnPluginTabComplete(word) if (tts_enabled == true) then say(word) end end
